Changes:
Original Document.
Changes from 2024 Supplemental Guide for Quarterly Filers:

1. Section 1.1 Institutions Required to File Quarterly
  • Updated Quarters 1-3 filing deadlines, discrete filing periods, & late submission dates to account for new 2025 calendar year and weekend deadlines
2. Section 1.1.1 Quarterly Filing Periods
  • Updated how filers should report for quarterly filing
3. Section 1.1.4 Edits
  • Added Filers should follow the 2025 FIG guidelines
4. Section 3.1 Frequently Asked Questions
  • Removed Self Service Knowledge Portal and Added Frequently Asked Questions and its weblink
